snippet: The fire and police departments faced some heat at an unexpected location: a charity hockey game where the two teams traded blows.
abstract: New York City firefighters and police officers, playing in a charity hockey game, wind up trading blows in a bench-clearing brawl matching the intense rivalry between their departments; Police Department later wins the match, 8-5, ending a five-game winning streak by the Fire Department.
lead_paragraph: The fire and police departments faced some heat at an unexpected location: a charity hockey game where the two teams traded blows.

headline.main: Fire vs. Police: Charity Game Leads to Fight
headline.print_headline: Fire vs. Police: Charity Game Leads to Fight
